channel.title: [Crash] Elevator at end of c1a1e
channel.description: Just after killing the two bullsquids, there is an elevator. Everytime I go in and hit the button, the loading text appears, and a few seconds later it crashes to desktop. Anyone have the same issue? EDIT: Added mdmp. hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T19_22_7C0.mdmp (101 KB)

item.title: [Crash] Elevator at end of c1a1e
item.dc:creator: askadaf
item.description:
sasuuni:

Just after killing the two bullsquids, there is an elevator. Everytime I go in and hit the button, the loading text appears, and a few seconds later it crashes to desktop. Anyone have the same issue?

EDIT: Added mdmp.

I had the same issue. My solution was to turn off flashlight before hitting the elevator button

Read full topic

item.title: [Crash] Elevator at end of c1a1e
item.dc:creator: scyrmion
item.description:
Yes I also have this issue, I posted here but your problem seems more related.
I put two crash dumps there.

Read full topic
